SELECT
UR.id AS update_request_id, UR.user_id AS user_id, UR.type AS type, UR.finished AS finished, UR.decision_expires_at AS decision_expires_at, UR.final_decision_result AS final_decision_result,
PR.requested_category_id AS pr_requested_category_id, PR.requested_subcategory_id AS pr_requested_subcategory_id, PR.requested_subcategory_name AS pr_requested_subcategory_name, PR.requested_phrase_content AS pr_requested_phrase_content, PR.requested_phrase_author_name AS pr_requested_phrase_author_name,
PM.requested_phrase_id AS pm_requested_phrase_id, PM.requested_category_id AS pm_requested_category_id, PM.requested_subcategory_id AS pm_requested_subcategory_id, PM.requested_subcategory_name AS pm_requested_subcategory_name, PM.requested_phrase_content AS pm_requested_phrase_content, PM.requested_phrase_author_name AS pm_requested_phrase_author_name, PM.current_category_id AS pm_current_category_id, PM.current_subcategory_id AS pm_current_subcategory_id, PM.current_subcategory_name AS pm_current_subcategory_name, PM.current_phrase_content AS pm_current_phrase_content, PM.current_phrase_author_name AS pm_current_phrase_author_name,
PD.requested_phrase_id AS pd_requested_phrase_id, PD.current_category_id AS pd_current_category_id, PD.current_subcategory_id AS pd_current_subcategory_id, PD.current_subcategory_name AS pd_current_subcategory_name, PD.current_phrase_content AS pd_current_phrase_content, PD.current_phrase_author_name AS pd_current_phrase_author_name,
SM.requested_subcategory_id AS sm_requested_subcategory_id, SM.requested_subcategory_name AS sm_requested_subcategory_name, SM.requested_subcategory_introduction AS sm_requested_subcategory_introduction, SM.requested_subcategory_image_path AS sm_requested_subcategory_image_path, SM.current_category_id AS sm_current_category_id, SM.current_subcategory_name AS sm_current_subcategory_name, SM.current_subcategory_introduction AS sm_current_subcategory_introduction, SM.current_subcategory_image_path AS sm_current_subcategory_image_path FROM update_requests UR LEFT JOIN phrase_registration_requests PR ON UR.id = PR.update_request_id LEFT JOIN phrase_modification_requests PM ON UR.id = PM.update_request_id LEFT JOIN phrase_deletion_requests PD ON UR.id = PD.update_request_id LEFT JOIN subcategory_modification_requests SM ON UR.id = SM.update_request_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO update_requests(id, user_id, type, finished, decision_expires_at, final_decision_result) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{type}, #{finished}, #{decisionExpiresAt}, #{finalDecisionResult})

INSERT INTO phrase_registration_requests( id, update_request_id, requested_category_id, requested_subcategory_id, requested_subcategory_name, requested_phrase_content, requested_phrase_author_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{updateRequestId}, #{requestedCategoryId}, #{requestedSubcategoryId}, #{requestedSubcategoryName}, #{requestedPhraseContent}, #{requestedPhraseAuthorName} )

INSERT INTO phrase_modification_requests( id, update_request_id, requested_phrase_id, requested_category_id, requested_subcategory_id, requested_subcategory_name, requested_phrase_content, requested_phrase_author_name, current_category_id, current_subcategory_id, current_subcategory_name, current_phrase_content, current_phrase_author_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{updateRequestId}, #{requestedPhraseId}, #{requestedCategoryId}, #{requestedSubcategoryId}, #{requestedSubcategoryName}, #{requestedPhraseContent}, #{requestedPhraseAuthorName}, #{currentCategoryId}, #{currentSubcategoryId}, #{currentSubcategoryName}, #{currentPhraseContent}, #{currentPhraseAuthorName} )

INSERT INTO phrase_deletion_requests( id, update_request_id, requested_phrase_id, current_category_id, current_subcategory_id, current_subcategory_name, current_phrase_content, current_phrase_author_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{updateRequestId}, #{requestedPhraseId}, #{currentCategoryId}, #{currentSubcategoryId}, #{currentSubcategoryName}, #{currentPhraseContent}, #{currentPhraseAuthorName} )

INSERT INTO subcategory_modification_requests( id, update_request_id, requested_subcategory_id, requested_subcategory_name, requested_subcategory_introduction, requested_subcategory_image_path, current_category_id, current_subcategory_name, current_subcategory_introduction, current_subcategory_image_path ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{updateRequestId}, #{requestedSubcategoryId}, #{requestedSubcategoryName}, #{requestedSubcategoryIntroduction}, #{requestedSubcategoryImagePath}, #{currentCategoryId}, #{currentSubcategoryName}, #{currentSubcategoryIntroduction}, #{currentSubcategoryImagePath} )
